bestmsm package¶

Submodules¶

bestmsm.msm module¶

class bestmsm.msm.MSM(trajectories, lag)¶

A class for constructing the MSM

Args:

trajectories (list of str): set of trajectories used for the construction.

lag (float): lag time for building the MSM

Attributes:

Methods

calc_count(trajectories, lag)¶

calculate transition count matrix

calc_rate(lagt)¶

calculate rate matrix using a Taylor series as described in De Sancho et al J Chem Theor Comput (2013)

calc_trans()¶

calculate transition matrix

check_connect()¶

check connectivity of rate matrix

get_eigs()¶
merge_trajs(trajectories)¶

bestmsm.pcca module¶

bestmsm.trajectory module¶

class bestmsm.trajectory.TimeSeries(filename, keys=None)¶

Time series reader

A class to store all information about trajectories to be used for the construction of the MSM

Parameters:

filename : str

The name of the file to read. It is also used for indexing.

Attributes

filename (str) The name of the file to read. It is also used for indexing.
time (list of floats) Time stamps for time series
states (list) Time series of states, whatever they are.
keys (list) The names of the states.

Methods

find_dt()¶

Finds spacing between frames

find_keys()¶

Finds state names

readtraj()¶

Reads trajectory files assuming two columns: time and state. If there is only a single column, times are assumed to be the line numbers
